pageContext.claim: “I do think it’s very bad for a country when the news is not accurately portrayed. I really do. And I do believe I'm a victim of that, honestly. In all due respect, I know what a good writer these two people are. But Peter’s been very tough on us the last couple of months. I don't know why, because I really think I'm doing a great job.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump in this interview with the New York Times did not point to a single example of an inaccurate story. As he reveals later in this quote, the president seems to think he deserves positive coverage and that anything other than that is factually inaccurate.
